alert.note: Alert for Bates; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 8:12PM CDT until May 08 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...Missouri... Little Osage River at Fulton affecting Bourbon County. Marmaton River near Nevada affecting Vernon County. Osage River near Schell City affecting Vernon and Bates Counties. Osage River at Taberville affecting St. Clair County. For the Little Osage River Basin...including Fulton, Horton... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Marmaton River Basin...including Fort Scott, Nevada...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Osage River Basin...including Schell City, Taberville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Osage River near Schell City. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 31.5 feet, the main road of the Schell Osage Conservation Area floods west of the conservation office. The north campground main road of the Schell Osage Conservation area floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 31.6 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 31.6 feet on 05/31/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 815 PM CDT.
